name: Free the cats Block Puzzle
description:
Free The Cats Block Puzzle is a free brain training game with cute graphics dedicated to all cat lovers! Challenge your puzzle game skills to rescue the cats and seize the minutes.

 This free to play game block puzzle lets you in a magical world of hundreds of fluffy multi-colors cute cats. Train your brain and find the suitable strategy to combine cat puzzle blocks and make a line to rescue them.

 Free The Cats features:

- Free play animal puzzle with 03 highly challenging modes for single player

- Addictive offline game: play anytime, stop anywhere with no time limit

- Simple gameplay to connect and match puzzle blocks together

- Super colorful designs of cute cats and adorable sounds

 How to free the cats:

- Combine puzzle blocks in order to build and destroy full lines of cats both vertically and horizontally

- Put your logic skills to the test: don't let the shapes fill the grid!

- Challenge yourselves in Bomb and Survival modes with more unpredictable difficulties

 All the cats are waiving at you! Let’s solve this challenging, irresistible and inescapable mini puzzle game to train your brain now, and stay tuned for hours!
